lemma mergeFrameRes1[simp]: fixes A\<^sub>F :: "name list" and \<Psi>\<^sub>F :: 'b and x :: name and A\<^sub>G :: "name list" and \<Psi>\<^sub>G :: 'b assumes "A\<^sub>F \<sharp>* \<Psi>\<^sub>G" and "A\<^sub>F \<sharp>* A\<^sub>G" and "x \<sharp> A\<^sub>F" and "x \<sharp> \<Psi>\<^sub>F" and "A\<^sub>G \<sharp>* \<Psi>\<^sub>F" shows "(\<langle>A\<^sub>F, \<Psi>\<^sub>F\<rangle>) \<otimes>\<^sub>F (\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>(\<langle>A\<^sub>G, \<Psi>\<^sub>G\<rangle>)) = (\<langle>(A\<^sub>F@x#A\<^sub>G), \<Psi>\<^sub>F \<otimes> \<Psi>\<^sub>G\<rangle>)"
